messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] riding in the car was the meanings of "can't"
messages.msgSnippet: ***I longed for her to ride up with me and hold hands and talk when she was younger and I felt like a taxi-driver as she was an only child for seven years.
messages.messageBody:
***I longed for her to ride up with me and hold hands and talk
when she was younger and I felt like a taxi-driver as she was an only
child for seven years. ****

Everyone thinks we're odd because when we ride together as a family dh (Stuart) rides in the back with Brogan rather than in the front with me. We however, love it. Brogan gets to play/ read with her daddy and isn't left 'alone' back there.

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
